formElement.label: Working Directory
formElement.documentation: Provide the directory where the Silk file resides.

formElement.label: Silk File
formElement.documentation: Provide a silk file, which can be a script, suite, testplan, or link file.

formElement.label: Arguments
formElement.documentation: If checked, this indicates that the Silk file has arguments.

formElement.label: Test Arguments
formElement.documentation: Define arguments for the Silk test.

formElement.label: File Directory
formElement.documentation: Indicate the directory where the Silk file is located. Leave blank to use the default directory.

formElement.label: Target Machine
formElement.documentation: Specify the target machine. The default is the current machine.

formElement.label: Project
formElement.documentation: Provide an optional argument specifying the project file or archived project to load when starting SilkTest.

formElement.label: base
formElement.documentation: Indicate the directory where the project will be unpacked.

formElement.label: Query
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of a saved query.

formElement.label: Log File
formElement.documentation: Specify the file where you want SilkTest to log compilation errors.

formElement.label: Additional Options
formElement.documentation: Provide any additional options for the Silk command.

formElement.label: Results File
formElement.documentation: If checked, this indicates that you want a .res file where the test results will be written.
